definitions.definition: the way in which two or more things which you are comparing are not the same:
examples: What's the difference between an ape and a monkey?
Exercise can make a big difference to your state of health.

definitions.definition: to not change a situation in any way:
examples: You can ask him again if you want, but it won't make any difference - he'll still say no.

definitions.definition: used to say that something is unusual, and more interesting or better than other things of the same type:
examples: Try new Cremetti - the ice cream with a difference.
